      • pushPlan

        public void pushPlan​(PlanFile plan)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                     java.rmi.RemoteException
        Saves planFile to the user's department if that planFile is marked as editable. If not editable, an exception is thrown. An exception is also thrown if a newly created planFile is not assigned a year.
        Parameters:
        plan -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • addUser

             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                    java.rmi.RemoteException
        Adds new user to loginMap, generates new cookie for user and adds to cookieMap. Throws exception if user isn't an admin or the department doesn't exist.
